biotools.summary:
Seamless integration of image and molecular analysis for spatial transcriptomics workflows.

STUtility requires R version >=3.6 and some packages within the Bioconductor suit needs to be installed prior to installing STUtility from github.

Welcome to the STUtility web site. STUtility is an R-package with the goal of providing an easy-to-use visualization and analysis tool kit for spatial transcriptomics data.

bioschemas.name: STUtility
